summary.zh: waoowaoo AI å½±è§† Studio æ˜¯é¦–å®¶å·¥ä¸šçº§å…¨æµç¨‹å¯æ§åä½œå¼ä¸“ä¸šAIagentå½±è§†ç”Ÿäº§å¹³å°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä»å°è¯´æ–‡æœ¬è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆåˆ†é•œã€è§’è‰²ã€åœºæ™¯å¹¶åˆ¶ä½œæˆå®Œæ•´è§†é¢‘ï¼Œæ¶µç›–çŸ­ç‰‡åˆ°æ¼«å‰§åˆ°çœŸäººçº§å½±è§†å‰§åˆ¶ä½œï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨å¥½è±åä¸“ä¸šåˆ¶ä½œå›¢é˜Ÿæ€è·¯ï¼Œæä¾›è™šæ‹Ÿåˆ¶ç‰‡åœºä½“éªŒã€‚
summary.en: waoowaoo AI Film Studio is the first industrial-grade, end-to-end controllable collaborative AI agent platform for professional film and TV production, supporting automatic generation of storyboards, characters, and scenes from novel text into complete videos, covering short films to web series to feature films, using Hollywood-level production workflows for virtual studio experience.

summary.zh: å¾®ä¿¡4.xæ•°æ®è§£å¯†ä¸åˆ†æå·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒèŠå¤©è®°å½•ã€æœ‹å‹åœˆç­‰æ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–å±•ç¤ºï¼Œç”Ÿæˆå¹´åº¦æ€»ç»“æŠ¥å‘Šï¼Œé«˜ä»¿å¾®ä¿¡ç•Œé¢ï¼Œæä¾›å®æ—¶æ›´æ–°ã€æœç´¢åŠå¯¼å‡ºåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨Python+Vue.js+SQLiteæŠ€æœ¯æ ˆã€‚
summary.en: WeChat 4.x data decryption and analysis tool with chat history, Moments visualization, annual summary generation, WeChat-like UI, real-time updates, search, and export capabilities, built using Python, Vue.js, and SQLite.

summary.en: Document Illustrator is an AI-powered tool that generates professional illustrations from documents. It supports multiple formats, three styles (gradient glass, ticket, vector), and outputs 16:9/3:4 images for social media like Xiaohongshu and Twitter.

summary.zh: nanobot æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾è¶…è½»é‡çº§ä¸ªäºº AI åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ä»…çº¦ 4,000 è¡Œä»£ç ï¼Œæ¯” Clawdbot ç¼©å° 99%ã€‚æ”¯æŒå¤šå¹³å°é€šä¿¡ï¼ˆSlackã€Discordã€Feishu ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œé›†æˆ MCP åè®®ã€å¤šæ¨¡æ€æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†ã€ä¼šè¯è®°å¿†ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œå…·å¤‡é«˜å¯é æ€§å’Œæ‰©å±•æ€§ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæ„å»ºè½»é‡åŒ–æ™ºèƒ½ä»£ç†ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚
summary.en: nanobot is an ultra-lightweight personal AI assistant with core agent functionality in ~4,000 lines of codeâ€”99% smaller than Clawdbot. It supports multi-channel communication (Slack, Discord, Feishu, etc.), integrates MCP protocol, multimodal file handling, and optimized session memory, offering high reliability and extensibility for lightweight AI agent deployment.

metadata.name: memU
metadata.description: Memory for 24/7 proactive agents like openclaw (moltbot, clawdbot).

summary.zh: memU æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸“ä¸º 24/7 ä¸»åŠ¨å¼ AI ä»£ç†è®¾è®¡çš„è®°å¿†æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç±»æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿç»“æ„ç»„ç»‡è®°å¿†ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—é™ä½ LLM ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æˆæœ¬ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæŒç»­å­¦ä¹ ç”¨æˆ·æ„å›¾å¹¶ä¸»åŠ¨å“åº”ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºé•¿æœŸè¿è¡Œçš„ç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒæ™ºèƒ½ä½“ã€‚
summary.en: memU is a memory framework for 24/7 proactive AI agents, using a file-system-like structure to organize memory, drastically reducing LLM token costs by caching insights and enabling continuous, context-aware user intent understanding.

summary.zh: Prompt Optimizer æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸šçš„AIæç¤ºè¯ä¼˜åŒ–å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šè½®è¿­ä»£ä¼˜åŒ–ã€åŒæ¨¡å¼æç¤ºè¯ç¼–è¾‘ã€å®æ—¶å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•åŠå¤šæ¨¡å‹é›†æˆï¼ˆOpenAI/Gemini/DeepSeekç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¶µç›–æ–‡ç”Ÿå›¾ã€å›¾ç”Ÿå›¾åŠMCPåè®®æ”¯æŒï¼Œæä¾›Web/æ¡Œé¢/Chromeæ’ä»¶/Dockerå››ç§éƒ¨ç½²æ–¹å¼ï¼Œçº¯å‰ç«¯æ¶æ„ä¿éšœæ•°æ®å®‰å…¨ã€‚
summary.en: Prompt Optimizer is a professional AI prompt optimization tool featuring multi-round iterative improvement, dual-mode prompt editing, real-time comparison testing, and integration with major AI models (OpenAI/Gemini/DeepSeek). It supports text-to-image, image-to-image generation, MCP protocol compatibility, and offers four deployment options: Web, desktop app, Chrome extension, and Docker.

summary.en: This project offers the largest open-source collection of 8,000+ verified n8n workflows, providing free JSON downloads with smart filtering by role and integration. Built with Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase, it features a self-hostable search interface deployable via Vercel or locally, enabling efficient automation template discovery and management.

summary.en: A cross-platform desktop All-in-One assistant tool for Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode & Gemini CLI, built with Tauri 2, offering unified management and optimized AI coding experience with integrated API relay services and exclusive user benefits.

metadata.name: everything-claude-code
metadata.description: The agent harness performance optimization system. Skills, instincts, memory, security, and research-first development for Claude Code, Codex, Cowork, and beyond. ğŸ§

summary.zh: Everything Claude Code æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸º AI æ™ºèƒ½ä½“æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–è®¾è®¡çš„å®Œæ•´ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ¶µç›–æŠ€èƒ½ã€ç›´è§‰ã€å†…å­˜ã€å®‰å…¨å’Œç ”ç©¶ä¼˜å…ˆçš„å¼€å‘æµç¨‹ã€‚åŸºäº Anthropic é»‘å®¢æ¾è·å¥–é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Claude Codeã€Codexã€Cowork ç­‰ä¸»æµæ™ºèƒ½ä½“æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæä¾›ç”Ÿäº§çº§é…ç½®ã€é’©å­ã€å‘½ä»¤ã€è§„åˆ™åŠ MCP é›†æˆï¼Œå®ç°è·¨ä¼šè¯è®°å¿†æŒä¹…åŒ–ã€è‡ªåŠ¨æŠ€èƒ½æå–ä¸å¹¶è¡ŒåŒ–å¼€å‘ã€‚
summary.en: Everything Claude Code is a comprehensive performance optimization system for AI agent harnesses, featuring skills, instincts, memory, security, and research-first development. Built from an Anthropic hackathon winner, it supports Claude Code, Codex, Cowork, and more, offering production-ready agents, hooks, commands, rules, and MCP configurations with cross-session memory persistence and automated skill extraction.

summary.en: RedInk is a one-stop Xiaohongshu image-and-text generator powered by ğŸŒNano Banana ProğŸŒ, enabling 'one sentence, one image' creation with AI-driven content outlines, cover pages, and batch content generation. Built with Python Flask backend and Vue 3 frontend, it supports Docker deployment and API integration.

summary.zh: beautiful-mermaid æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜æ€§èƒ½çš„ Mermaid å›¾è¡¨æ¸²æŸ“åº“ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ SVG å’Œ ASCII åŒè¾“å‡ºæ¨¡å¼ï¼Œå…·å¤‡ 15 ç§å†…ç½®ä¸»é¢˜ã€é›¶ DOM ä¾èµ–ã€åŒæ­¥æ¸²æŸ“ç­‰ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œä¸“ä¸º AI ç¼–ç¨‹åŠ©æ‰‹å’Œç»ˆç«¯å·¥å…·è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå¯æ— ç¼é›†æˆ React ç»„ä»¶ã€‚
summary.en: beautiful-mermaid is a high-performance Mermaid diagram renderer supporting dual SVG/ASCII output, 15 built-in themes, zero DOM dependencies, and synchronous rendering. Designed for AI coding assistants and terminal tools with seamless React integration.

metadata.name: BMAD-METHOD
metadata.description: Breakthrough Method for Agile Ai Driven Development

summary.zh: BMad Method æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª AI é©±åŠ¨çš„æ•æ·å¼€å‘æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæä¾›ç»“æ„åŒ–å·¥ä½œæµç¨‹å’Œ12+é¢†åŸŸä¸“å®¶ä»£ç†ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä»å°å‹ä¿®å¤åˆ°ä¼ä¸šçº§ç³»ç»Ÿçš„è‡ªé€‚åº”å¼€å‘ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬æ™ºèƒ½åŠ©æ‰‹ `/bmad-help`ã€å¤šä»£ç†åä½œæ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆParty Modeï¼‰ã€å®Œæ•´ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸç®¡ç†ï¼Œä»¥åŠè·¨å¹³å°é›†æˆèƒ½åŠ›ï¼ŒåŠ©åŠ›å¼€å‘è€…é«˜æ•ˆæ„å»ºé«˜è´¨é‡è½¯ä»¶ã€‚
summary.en: BMad Method is an AI-driven agile development framework featuring structured workflows, 12+ domain-expert agents, and scale-adaptive intelligence for projects from bug fixes to enterprise systems. Key features include smart guidance via `/bmad-help`, multi-agent collaboration (Party Mode), full lifecycle support, and cross-platform integration for efficient, high-quality software development.

metadata.name: Antigravity-Manager
metadata.description: Professional Antigravity Account Manager & Switcher. One-click seamless account switching for Antigravity Tools. Built with Tauri v2 + React (Rust).ä¸“ä¸šçš„ Antigravity è´¦å·ç®¡ç†ä¸åˆ‡æ¢å·¥å…·ã€‚ä¸º Antigravity æä¾›ä¸€é”®æ— ç¼è´¦å·åˆ‡æ¢åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

summary.zh: Antigravity-Manager æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸šçš„ AI è´¦å·ç®¡ç†ä¸åè®®ä»£ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼ŒåŸºäº Tauri v2 + React å’Œ Rust æ„å»ºã€‚å®ƒæä¾›ä¸€é”®æ— ç¼è´¦å·åˆ‡æ¢ã€å¤šåè®®é€‚é…ï¼ˆOpenAI/Anthropic/Geminiï¼‰ã€æ™ºèƒ½é…é¢ç›‘æ§ä¸è‡ªåŠ¨é‡è¯•æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ OAuth 2.0 æˆæƒã€æ¨¡å‹è·¯ç”±åˆ†çº§åŠé«˜è¾¾ 100MB çš„å¤šæ¨¡æ€è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ˜¯å¼€å‘è€…æ„å»ºæœ¬åœ° AI ä¸­è½¬ç«™çš„ç†æƒ³å·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: Antigravity-Manager is a professional AI account management and protocol proxy system built with Tauri v2 + React and Rust. It enables one-click seamless account switching, multi-protocol support (OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini), intelligent quota monitoring, automatic retry on 429/401 errors, OAuth 2.0 authorization, tiered model routing, and handles up to 100MB multimodal payloads for high-resolution image generation.

summary.zh: OpenMozi æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè½»é‡çº§ AI åŠ©æ‰‹æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºå›½äº§ç”Ÿæ€è®¾è®¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ DeepSeekã€è±†åŒ…ã€é€šä¹‰åƒé—®ç­‰å›½äº§å¤§æ¨¡å‹åŠ OpenAI/Anthropic å…¼å®¹æ¥å£ã€‚æ¡†æ¶é›†æˆé£ä¹¦ã€é’‰é’‰ã€QQã€ä¼ä¸šå¾®ä¿¡ç­‰å¤šå¹³å°é€šè®¯èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ Function Calling å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ã€25 ä¸ªå†…ç½®å·¥å…·ï¼ˆæ–‡ä»¶æ“ä½œã€æµè§ˆå™¨è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ã€å®šæ—¶ä»»åŠ¡ç­‰ï¼‰ã€è®°å¿†ç³»ç»Ÿå’Œ Skills æŠ€èƒ½æ‰©å±•æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä»£ç ç®€æ´é«˜æ•ˆï¼Œé€‚åˆä¼ä¸šçº§æœºå™¨äººå¼€å‘ã€‚
summary.en: OpenMozi is a lightweight AI assistant framework designed for the Chinese ecosystem, supporting domestic large models like DeepSeek, Doubao, and Qwen, as well as OpenAI/Anthropic-compatible APIs. It integrates multi-platform communication (Feishu, DingTalk, QQ, WeCom), provides unified Function Calling, 25 built-in tools (file ops, browser automation, cron jobs), memory system, and Skills extension mechanism. With clean architecture and ~16k lines of code, it's ideal for enterprise bot development.

metadata.name: toMic
metadata.description: ToMic - Turn Your Phone into a PC Microphone

summary.zh: ToMic æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Web æŠ€æœ¯çš„å±€åŸŸç½‘è™šæ‹Ÿéº¦å…‹é£å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¯å°†æ‰‹æœºæµè§ˆå™¨ä½œä¸ºç”µè„‘éº¦å…‹é£è¾“å…¥æºï¼Œé€šè¿‡ Wi-Fi ä¼ è¾“éŸ³é¢‘å¹¶åˆ©ç”¨è™šæ‹Ÿå£°å¡ï¼ˆå¦‚ BlackHole/VB-CABLEï¼‰æ³¨å…¥ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚æ”¯æŒé›¶å®‰è£…ã€ä½å»¶è¿Ÿä¼ è¾“ã€HTTPS å®‰å…¨è¿æ¥ï¼Œå¹¶é›†æˆ SoX å®ç°æ™ºèƒ½éŸ³é¢‘è·¯ç”±ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äº Zoomã€Teams ç­‰ä¼šè®®åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: ToMic is a Web-based LAN virtual microphone tool that turns your phone into a PC microphone via browser. It streams audio over Wi-Fi using WebSocket and Opus encoding, then injects it into the system via virtual sound cards (BlackHole/VB-CABLE). Features zero-install, low-latency, HTTPS security, and SoX-based audio routing for apps like Zoom and Teams.

metadata.name: creative_tools

summary.en: AI-powered video and comic creation tool leveraging Gemini (Nano Banano & VEO) APIs, enabling script-to-scene generation, character consistency, canvas-based editing, and project management for content creators.

metadata.name: Infographic
metadata.description: ğŸ¦‹ An Infographic Generation and Rendering Framework, bring words to life with AI!

summary.zh: AntV Infographic æ˜¯èš‚èšé›†å›¢ AntV å›¢é˜Ÿæ¨å‡ºçš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä»£å£°æ˜å¼ä¿¡æ¯å›¾å¯è§†åŒ–å¼•æ“ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸“ä¸º AI ä¼˜åŒ–çš„é…ç½®è¯­æ³•å’Œçº¦ 200 ä¸ªå†…ç½®æ¨¡æ¿ç»„ä»¶ã€‚æ”¯æŒ AI å‹å¥½æç¤ºè¯ç”Ÿæˆã€æµå¼æ¸²æŸ“è¾“å‡ºï¼Œå…·å¤‡ä¸»é¢˜ç³»ç»Ÿã€SVG æ¸²æŸ“ã€å†…ç½®ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¯å¿«é€Ÿåˆ›å»ºé«˜è´¨é‡ä¿¡æ¯å›¾ï¼Œæå‡æ•°æ®å™äº‹æ•ˆç‡ã€‚
summary.en: AntV Infographic is AntV's next-generation declarative infographic visualization engine, featuring AI-optimized syntax and ~200 built-in templates. It supports AI-friendly prompts, streaming rendering, theme system, SVG output, and an integrated editor for creating professional infographics efficiently.

summary.zh: MateCode æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé€šè¿‡ Telegram è¿œç¨‹æ§åˆ¶ Claude Code çš„æ¡¥æ¥å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé•¿æœŸè®°å¿†ã€ä¼šè¯ç®¡ç†ã€ä»£ç é«˜äº®ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨çº¯ Python æ ‡å‡†åº“å¼€å‘ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é•¿è½®è¯¢å®ç°ä½å»¶è¿Ÿé€šä¿¡ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ä¿éšœéšç§å®‰å…¨ã€‚
summary.en: MateCode is a bridge tool that enables remote control of Claude Code via Telegram, featuring long-term memory, session management, and code highlighting. Built with pure Python standard libraries, it uses long polling for low-latency communication with local data storage for privacy.

summary.zh: WorkAny æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾æ¡Œé¢çº§ AI æ™ºèƒ½ä½“åº”ç”¨ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€æŒ‡ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œå¤æ‚ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå®æ—¶ä»£ç ç”Ÿæˆã€å¤šæ¨¡æ€æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†ï¼ˆæ–‡æ¡£/ç½‘é¡µ/è¡¨æ ¼/å¹»ç¯ç‰‡ï¼‰ã€æ²™ç®±ç¯å¢ƒæ‰§è¡ŒåŠ MCP åè®®é›†æˆï¼ŒåŸºäº Claude Agent SDK æ„å»ºï¼Œæä¾›è·¨å¹³å°æ¡Œé¢ç«¯ä½“éªŒã€‚
summary.en: WorkAny is a desktop AI agent that executes tasks via natural language, featuring real-time code generation, multi-format file creation (docs/web/excel/ppt), sandboxed code execution, and MCP integration. Built on Claude Agent SDK with a Tauri-based cross-platform desktop interface.

summary.zh: ThinkFlow AI æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Vue 3 å’Œ AI çš„è½»é‡çº§å·¥ä½œå°ï¼Œå¯å°†æ ¸å¿ƒæƒ³æ³•è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰©å±•ä¸ºäº¤äº’å¼çŸ¥è¯†å›¾è°±ï¼Œæ”¯æŒèŠ‚ç‚¹è¿½é—®ã€æ·±åº¦è§£æä¸é…å›¾ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œå®ç°ä»æŠ½è±¡æ¦‚å¿µåˆ°ç»“æ„åŒ–æ€ç»´ç½‘ç»œçš„æ™ºèƒ½è½¬åŒ–ã€‚
summary.en: ThinkFlow AI is a lightweight workspace built with Vue 3 and AI that transforms core ideas into interactive knowledge graphs, enabling node-based expansion, deep dive analysis, and image generation for structured thinking.
